title: weeddaddy

content: Weed Daddy is absolutely HIGH to announce our very first Airdrop üòéJoin the Whitelist + NFT Airdrop now! comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Not an avid gambler, but I think marketing the NFT sale before launching the website by October isn't right? By this, I mean, it would be better to have an actual casino website where members or gamblers can play the game immediately to ascertain if buying a certain NFT is worthwhile.It would be very difficult to trust an NFT asset if the claimed benefits can't be tested on a finished casino game/site especially now that competitors had done the same idea. Plus, the NFT scene is declining like a ticking time bomb. Just an honest opinion though..

comments.author: davis196
comments.body: You joined Twitter in May and your Twitter account has 3 tweets and only one follower.Are you actively trying to promote this Twitter account? Do you think that this airdrop is going to boost your follower count?Your NFTs(assuming that the three images posted on your Twitter are actual NFTs) look nice, but the gamblers don't care about cartoonish images, they care about gambling. The NFT hype is gone and I don't think that your NFT are going to cost more than 20USD in the near future.Also "Weed Daddy"? This sounds fun, but kinda immature and childish.I get your marketing approach but I don't think that most of the gamblers are going to take your project seriously.Good luck with your "NFT casino", OP.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk Weed.I would love to say something or suggestion, before announcing your project here on gambling section why don't you focus building your gambling site and making it ready, because all i can see is about NFTs promotion and Airdrops but doesn't say about gambling part of your project. yes we know it would be launched later but the best is launching before announcing it here. secondly focus on building media platform, for instance your telegram groups, twitter handle ect. This could attract more attention from people around the forum maybe also outsides from the forum as well. So i will say take your time and build your project around the bear market then in bull you can make whatever promotion you feel like making to get you a stability.Good luck with your project.
